Scripts.OnEnter: self.highlight:Show() if self.tooltip then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOP", 0, -15) GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltip, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltipDescription, 1, 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:IsEnabled() then self.arrowUp:Hide() self.arrowDown:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.xoffset = -15 local newWidth = min(128, self.text:GetStringWidth()+50) local texCoordoffsetX = (newWidth/128)*0.25
self:GetNormalTexture():SetTexCoord(0.70312500-texCoordoffsetX, 0.70312500, 0.00781250, 0.24218750) self:GetPushedTexture():SetTexCoord(0.70312500-texCoordoffsetX, 0.70312500, 0.25781250, 0.49218750) self:GetHighlightTexture():SetTexCoord(0.70312500-texCoordoffsetX, 0.71312500, 0.50781250, 0.74218750)
self:SetWidth(newWidth)

self.setPointArrow = function(self, checked) if self.vertical then if checked then self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, 1) self.icon:SetTexCoord(1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1) else self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, -1) self.icon:SetTexCoord(0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0) end else if checked then self.icon:SetTexCoord(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0) self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER", -1, 0) else self.icon:SetTexCoord(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1, 1) self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER") end end end hooksecurefunc(self, "SetChecked", self.setPointArrow)
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Down") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x - 1, y - 1) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Up") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x + 1, y + 1) end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Down") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x - 1, y - 1) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Up") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x + 1, y + 1) end

Scripts.OnClick: local frame = self:GetParent() while not frame.selectButtonClick do frame = frame:GetParent() end frame:selectButtonClick(self.id)
Scripts.OnEnter: if self.displayID then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.subName:IsShown() and self.subName:GetText() or self.name:GetText(), 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:Show() MJTooltipModel.model:SetDisplayInfo(self.displayID) MJTooltipModel.model:SetDoBlend(false) MJTooltipModel.model:SetAnimation(742, 0) MJTooltipModel:Show() end
